articles.content: The selection of Anil Menon, an American of Indian origin, as one of the 10 future astronauts by NASA marks a new turning point in the history of space missions. He is a pilot of the American Air For… [+1622 chars]

articles.title: Nick Cannon's 5-month-old son, Zen, has died of brain cancer - CBC News
articles.description: American entertainer Nick Cannon announced his son's tragic death during a taping of The Nick Cannon Show on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Nick Cannon's five-month-old son Zen has died from brain cancer.
During a taping of The Nick Cannon Show on Tuesday which Cannon referred to as a "celebration of life"  the former America's Got Tale… [+1490 chars]
